MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the DG8 postcode area of Newton Stewart. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.28am. Our engineers are on site and our team are now patrolling the overhead line network to locate the fault and make a repair. We expect your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.02am on the 5th of March 2021.
